body: I bought gold rank yesterday at 16:20 PDT and still haven't received the rank yet. I received the confirmation email showing my payment to Avicus
body_tagged: I bought gold rank yesterday at 16:20 PDT and still haven't received the rank yet. I received the confirmation email showing my payment to Avicus
title: Haven't received Gold rank

replies.body: If you haven't received your rank within 48 hours, e-mail support@avicus.net with proof of purchase.
replies.body_tagged: If you haven't received your rank within 48 hours, e-mail support@avicus.net with proof of purchase.

replies.body: Aww man PeachyYas said 24 hours, alright thanks
